tool_description: The "Quotes Diffusion" API provides users with a vast collection of curated popular quotes from around the world. It includes 56,394 quotes, spanning 1,963 topics, from 10,920 authors. The API also generates background images based on keywords from the quotes using text-to-image diffusion models.
name: Quotes Diffusion
title: Quotes Diffusion

api_list.name: /random

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search for a random quote based on custom terms

api_list.name: /topic

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search for topics based on custom terms

api_list.name: /author

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Search for authors based on custom terms
